name: part_011
file: tmp_真夏のReGLOSSカラオケ！〜新曲披露もあるよ〜【#真夏のReGLOSS】 [DiHB5voNt00]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: The members of ReGLOSS talk on the couch before getting up to perform their final song of the karaoke session.
Performance of 'We Are!', the first opening theme of the anime 'One Piece'.
Post-performance talk and announcements regarding the digital release of their new song and the next group stream date.

subtitles.original: はーい！
subtitles.english: Haa-i!

subtitles.original: じゃあちょっと連続なんですけど、
subtitles.english: Well, we're going back-to-back, but

subtitles.original: あ、よいしょ。あ、足。
subtitles.english: there we go. Ah, my leg.

subtitles.original: 最後4人で歌いたいと思います！
subtitles.english: lastly, the four of us will sing together!

subtitles.original: おー！
subtitles.english: Oh!

subtitles.original: よっしゃー！
subtitles.english: Alright!

subtitles.original: 何を歌うんですか？
subtitles.english: What are we singing?

subtitles.original: 何を歌うんだろうね？
subtitles.english: I wonder what it could be?

subtitles.original: じゃあ皆さん聞いてください。
subtitles.english: Well then, everyone, please listen.

subtitles.original: お願いします！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: ウィーアー！
subtitles.english: We are!

subtitles.original: 富、名声、力。
subtitles.english: Wealth, fame, power.

subtitles.original: この世のすべてを手に入れた男、海賊王ゴールド・ロジャー。
subtitles.english: The man who obtained everything in this world, the Pirate King, Gold Roger.

subtitles.original: 彼の死にぎわに放った一言は人々を海へ駆り立てた。
subtitles.english: His final words before his death drove people to the seas.

subtitles.original: 「俺の財宝か？ 欲しけりゃくれてやる。」
subtitles.english: “My treasure? If you want it, it’s yours.”

subtitles.original: 「探せ！ この世のすべてをそこに置いてきた！」
subtitles.english: “Find it! I left everything this world has to offer there!”

subtitles.original: 男たちはグランドラインを目指し夢を追い続ける。
subtitles.english: Men head for the Grand Line to pursue their dreams.

subtitles.original: 世はまさに大海賊時代！
subtitles.english: The world is truly in the Great Pirate Era!

subtitles.original: ありったけの夢をかき集め
subtitles.english: Gather up all your dreams

subtitles.original: 捜し物を捜しに行くのさ One Piece
subtitles.english: And go in search of what you’re looking for! One Piece!

subtitles.original: 捜し物を捜しに行くのさ
subtitles.english: And go in search of what you’re looking for

subtitles.original: One Piece!
subtitles.english: One Piece!

subtitles.original: 羅針盤なんて 渋滞のもと
subtitles.english: A compass is just a cause for traffic

subtitles.original: 熱にうかされ 舵をとるのさ
subtitles.english: Carried away by fever, I'll take the helm

subtitles.original: ホコリかぶってた 宝の地図も
subtitles.english: Even a dusty treasure map

subtitles.original: 確かめたのなら 伝説じゃない！
subtitles.english: Is no longer a legend once you've confirmed it!

subtitles.original: 個人的な嵐は 誰かの
subtitles.english: A personal storm is someone else's

subtitles.original: バイオリズム 乗っかって
subtitles.english: Biorhythm, just hop on it

subtitles.original: 思い過ごせばいい！
subtitles.english: And let it pass through your mind!

subtitles.original: ありったけの夢をかき集め
subtitles.english: Gather up all your dreams

subtitles.original: 捜し物を捜しに行くのさ
subtitles.english: And go in search of what you’re looking for

subtitles.original: ポケットのコイン、それと
subtitles.english: A coin in your pocket, and

subtitles.original: You wanna be my Friend?
subtitles.english: You wanna be my Friend?

subtitles.original: We are, We are on the cruise! ウィーアー！
subtitles.english: We are, We are on the cruise! We are!

subtitles.original: ぜんぶまに受けて 信じちゃっても
subtitles.english: Even if you take it all seriously and believe it

subtitles.original: 肩を押されて １歩リードさ
subtitles.english: Getting a push on the shoulder gives you a one-step lead

subtitles.original: 今度会えたなら 話すつもりさ
subtitles.english: If we can meet again, I plan to talk to you

subtitles.original: それからのことと これからのこと
subtitles.english: About what's happened since then and what's to come

subtitles.original: つまりいつも ピンチは誰かに
subtitles.english: In other words, a pinch is always

subtitles.original: アピール出来る いいチャンス
subtitles.english: A good chance to show off to someone

subtitles.original: 自意識過剰に！
subtitles.english: With excessive self-consciousness!

subtitles.original: しみったれた夜を ぶっとばせ！
subtitles.english: Blow away the stingy night!

subtitles.original: 宝箱にキョウミは ないけれど
subtitles.english: Though I have no interest in treasure chests

subtitles.english: Romance in your pocket, and

subtitles.english: We are!

subtitles.original: ウィーアー！
subtitles.english: We are!

subtitles.original: ウィーアー！
subtitles.english: We are!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！ウィーアー！
subtitles.english: Yay! We are!

subtitles.original: やばいもう時間だ、時間だ！
subtitles.english: Oh no, it's already time, it's time!

subtitles.original: 最後にお知らせがあります！
subtitles.english: Lastly, we have some announcements!

subtitles.original: あ、いう間だ...
subtitles.english: Ah, in no time...

subtitles.original: 改めてになりますが、明日0時、つまり今日の24時に
subtitles.english: Once again, tomorrow at 0:00, which is 24:00 today...

subtitles.original: Midsummer Citrusがデジタルリリースされます！
subtitles.english: Midsummer Citrus will be released digitally!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: こちらあと4時間後くらいかな？聞けるようになります！
subtitles.english: That's in about 4 hours? You'll be able to listen to it!

subtitles.original: そして、来月の配信なんですが、いつも10日に
subtitles.english: And about next month's stream, we usually do this

subtitles.original: ReGLOSSのこの配信やってるんですけど
subtitles.english: ReGLOSS stream on the 10th...

subtitles.original: 8月は8月1日に配信予定となっておりますので、
subtitles.english: In August, the stream is scheduled for August 1st,

subtitles.original: 間違えないように注意してください。
subtitles.english: so please be careful not to mistake the date.

subtitles.original: 1日だ！
subtitles.english: The 1st!

subtitles.original: 1日だ！
subtitles.english: The 1st!

subtitles.original: よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: Please look forward to it!

subtitles.original: いや楽しかったねカラオケ。
subtitles.english: Man, karaoke was fun.

subtitles.original: あっという間だった...
subtitles.english: It went by in a flash...
